root.name: Madden NFL '94
root.description: Madden NFL '94 was the first Madden with the slogan "If it's in the game, it's in the game." This Madden was the first with NFL team license and the first that allowed the player to play a full 16-game regular season.Â It was the first John Madden Football game that dropped "John" out of its title, calling itself Madden NFL '94. New features in this Madden included the play-call mode, pass-catch mode, bluff play, and the ability to "flip" the called play.
